DIA_4022_CityGuard_SecondBribeAttempt_02: If you want something, you talk to the captain. I'm not in charge here.
DIA_4022_CityGuard_ThirdBribeAttempt_02_: You're a stubborn little guy, aren't you? Okay, what do you want?
DIA_4022_CityGuard_ThirdBribeAttempt_15_: Isn't there some other way to get into the city?
DIA_4022_CityGuard_ThirdBribeAttempt_02_: And how much do you care?
DIA_4022_CityGuard_ThirdBribeAttempt_bro: My brother is missing and I need to find someone to help me find him.
Touching story, but if you can't get a pass to enter the city, I doubt you'll find anyone willing to help you find your brother.
DIA_4022_CityGuard_ThirdBribeAttempt_job: I have some urgent business in the city that I need to take care of.
Urgent matters... Everyone has one. You know what?
I think you'd better go, I have to take care of mine too.
DIA_4022_CityGuard_ThirdBribeAttempt_bri: Let's put it this way, I carry several pouches of gold that are so heavy they're begging to be emptied.
Archolos seems like the perfect place to get rid of a few of them.
You don't look like a rich man to me, but if your pouches weigh you down that much, I wouldn't be surprised if one fell out while you were going through the gate.
The question is, how much gold would be in it...
I think your pass fell out with that pouch.
DIA_4022_CityGuard_ThirdBribeAttempt_not: I don't even want to bend down for that kind of money.
DIA_4022_CityGuard_ThirdBribeAttempt_too: No one in their right mind carries pouches with such riches.
It seems a little suspicious to me. You'd better keep that gold to yourself. I don't want any trouble.
DIA_4022_CityGuard_ThirdBribeAttempt_bro: My brother is missing and I am looking for someone to help me.
DIA_4022_CityGuard_ThirdBribeAttempt_bri: How about a few gold pieces?
